org.apache.gora.store.ws.impl

Class WSDataStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.store.ws.impl.WSDataStoreFactory

  • public class WSDataStoreFactory
extends Object
    A Factory for Web-based DataStores. DataStoreFactory instances are thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • createProps

        public static Properties createProps()
        Creates a new Properties. It adds the default gora configuration resources. This properties object can be modified and used to instantiate store instances. It is recommended to use a properties object for a single store, because the properties object is passed on to store initialization methods that are able to store the properties as a field.
        Returns:
        The new properties object.

      • createDataStore

        public static <D extends DataStore<K,T>,K,T extends Persistent> D createDataStore(Class<D> dataStoreClass,
                                                                                  Class<K> keyClass,
                                                                                  Class<T> persistent,
                                                                                  Object auth)
                                                                           throws GoraException
        Instantiate a new DataStore. Uses default properties. Uses 'null' schema.
        Parameters:
        dataStoreClass - The datastore implementation class.
        keyClass - The key class.
        persistent - The value class.
        auth - an authentication Object to be used for communication.
        Returns:
        A new store instance.
        Throws:
        GoraException

      • findProperty

        public static String findProperty(Properties properties,
                                  DataStore<?,?> store,
                                  String baseKey,
                                  String defaultValue)
        Tries to find a property with the given baseKey. First the property key constructed as "gora.<classname>.<baseKey>" is searched. If not found, the property keys for all superclasses is recursively tested. Lastly, the property key constructed as "gora.datastore.<baseKey>" is searched.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to be used be the store.
        store - the datastore class we wish to search for the property within.
        baseKey - the key associated with the property we are trying to find.
        defaultValue - a default (fallback) value for the property we wish to assert.
        Returns:
        the first found value, or defaultValue

      • findPropertyOrDie

        public static String findPropertyOrDie(Properties properties,
                                       DataStore<?,?> store,
                                       String baseKey)
                                throws IOException
        Tries to find a property with the given baseKey. First the property key constructed as "gora.<classname>.<baseKey>" is searched. If not found, the property keys for all superclasses is recursively tested. Lastly, the property key constructed as "gora.datastore.<baseKey>" is searched.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to be used be the store.
        store - the datastore class we wish to search for the property within.
        baseKey - the key associated with the property we are trying to find.
        Returns:
        the first found value, or throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • findBooleanProperty

        public static boolean findBooleanProperty(Properties properties,
                                          DataStore<?,?> store,
                                          String baseKey,
                                          String defaultValue)
        Asserts whether or not we can find a particular property based on the property with the given baseKey. First the property key constructed as "gora.<classname>.<baseKey>" is searched. If not found, the property keys for all superclasses is recursively tested. Lastly, the property key constructed as "gora.datastore.<baseKey>" is searched. We parse the boolean output and assert whether such a property exists or not.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to be used be the store.
        store - the datastore class we wish to search for the property within.
        baseKey - the key associated with the property we are trying to find.
        defaultValue - a default (fallback) value for the property we wish to assert.
        Returns:
        the first found value, or throws IOException

      • getAutoCreateSchema

        public static boolean getAutoCreateSchema(Properties properties,
                                          DataStore<?,?> store)
        Asserts whether schema/datamodel autocreation is supported within datastore initialization. Assentially we scan the datastore class for a static AUTO_CREATE_SCHEMA constant. Additionally, we expect this to be true for each datastore.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to be used be the store.
        store - the datastore class we wish to search for the property within.
        Returns:
        the first found value, or throws IOException

      • getInputPath

        public static String getInputPath(Properties properties,
                                  DataStore<?,?> store)
        Returns the input path as read from the properties for file-backed data stores.

      • getOutputPath

        public static String getOutputPath(Properties properties,
                                   DataStore<?,?> store)
        Returns the output path as read from the properties for file-backed data stores.

      • getMappingFile

        public static String getMappingFile(Properties properties,
                                    DataStore<?,?> store,
                                    String defaultValue)
        Returns a particular instance of an XML mapping file for some particular properties and datastore. We can specify numerous mapping files per mapping configuration with this option and obtain them at runtime.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to be used be the store.
        store - The datastore class we wish to search for the property within.
        defaultValue - The name of the XML mapping file we wish to use.
        Returns:

      • getDefaultSchemaName

        public static String getDefaultSchemaName(Properties properties,
                                          DataStore<?,?> store)
        Gets the default schema name of a given store class

                                        String schemaName)
        Sets the default schema name.

                                                                                          Class<D> dataStoreClass,
                                                                                          String schemaName)
